timeline.bodyText: Why choose to require this one?
timeline.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: Because the original has no default values whereas IconTableCellFormatter does have default values.  I will add default values for this class.

timeline.message: refactor: Add PR feedback for ids.

timeline.bodyText: I'm not familiar with IconTableCellFormatter, but if it's a repeated field, it should probably have a dynamic suffix so that there are no errors related to uniqueness.
timeline.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: Same thing for editButtonClick above this.
replies.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: Confirmed with QA that that unique ids for the cells won't benefit them as of now.  The edit button and copy button formatters will have different ids from each other.  I will update that.
replies.author: psantos1113

timeline.message: refactor: Do not require the id prop and set defaults.
refactor: Update the edit and copy cell ids to be different from each other.
